reviewText:
This DVD contains 3 really fun episodes from 2 different seasons that all feature episodes about Ice Pokmon but they are not in order of when they aired. The first episode on this disc is "Freeze Frame" (Episode #32 in Season 4: Johto League Champions). In this episode Ash, Misty, Brock, and their friend Todd go looking for an Articuno to take it's picture and end up getting saved by Articuno in a blizzard. The second episode on this disc is "Let it Snow, Let it Snow, Let it Snorunt" (Episode #16 in Season 8: Advanced Battle). In this episode Ash, Brock, May, and Max meet a mischievous Snorunt at a Pokmon Center. The Snorunt steals Ash's badges and he chases it into a blizzard but later becomes friends with it and Snorunt joins them on their journey. The third episode on this disc is "Spring Fever" (Episode #31 in Season 4: Johto League Champions). In this episode Ash, Misty, Brock, and their friend Todd help a hot spring digger whose Swinub were stolen by Team Rocket.

Pokmon Elements Volume 05 Episodes:
Spring Fever (Episode #31 in Season 4: Johto League Champions)
Freeze Frame (Episode #32 in Season 4: Johto League Champions)
Let it Snow, Let it Snow, Let it Snorunt (Episode #16 in Season 8: Advanced Battle)

Just what I like to have, thank you.

Sincerely,

Michael Browne
